name: Blueberry Kush
description: Blueberry Kush is a strong indica strain that slowly brings on a heavy body sensation, helping patients forget their pain and relax. Originally from Oregon, this strain is a hybrid of Blueberry and OG Kush, which is evident in its fresh berry aroma with notes of earthy herbalness. This indica is best for evenings or before bed.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Euphoric, Sleepy, Hungry, Pain, Stress, Insomnia, Depression, Lack of Appetite, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Headache, Paranoid
